org.xchain.framework.security

Class DefaultIdentityService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xchain.framework.security.DefaultIdentityService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, IdentityService

    @LifecycleClass(uri="http://www.xchain.org/security/1.0")
public class DefaultIdentityService
extends java.lang.Object
implements IdentityService
    The DefaultIdentityService always returns the DefaultIdentity. It cannot perform authentication. Applications that want to support authentication and Identity management should implement IdentityService and install their own service in a lifecycle step before this.
    Author:
    Jason Rose, Christian Trimble, Josh Kennedy
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
